title: 面板服务器报错求大佬解答
txt_content:
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Starting server!
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "mc1.7.10"
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Updating eula.txt file
13.09 01:49:06 [Server] INFO ?í?ó: ???????ò??·¨?????÷?à cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.ServerLaunchWrapper
13.09 01:49:06 [Server] INFO OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM warning: ignoring option MaxPermSize=128M; support was removed in 8.0
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Server shut down (starting)
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Restarting crashed server in 5 seconds
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Stopping server!
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Server shut down (stopping)
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
13.09 01:49:06 [Multicraft] Server stopped
怎么回事求解答

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content: 服务端核心问题。重新上传核心或者转码
